title: Dev UI for GRPC fails
body: ### Describe the bug Navigating to Dev ui for grpc services failes with `java.util.ServiceConfigurationError: org.eclipse.microprofile.context.spi.ContextManagerExtension: io.smallrye.mutiny.context.MutinyContextManagerExtension not a subtype` ``` Listening for transport dt_socket at address: 5005 __ ____ __ _____ ___ __ ____ ______ --/ __ \/ / / / _ | / _ \/ //_/ / / / __/ -/ /_/ / /_/ / __ |/ , _/ ,< / /_/ /\ \ --\___\_\____/_/ |_/_/|_/_/|_|\____/___/ 2023-01-07 05:17:28,281 INFO [io.qua.grp.run.GrpcServerRecorder] (Quarkus Main Thread) Registering gRPC reflection service 2023-01-07 05:17:28,363 INFO [io.qua.grp.run.GrpcServerRecorder] (Quarkus Main Thread) Starting new Vert.x gRPC server ... 2023-01-07 05:17:28,489 INFO [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) helloworld 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT on JVM (powered by Quarkus 2.15.2.Final) started in 3.118s. Listening on: http://localhost:8080 2023-01-07 05:17:28,500 INFO [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) Profile dev activated. Live Coding activated. 2023-01-07 05:17:28,501 INFO [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) Installed features: [cdi, grpc-server, resteasy-reactive, smallrye-context-propagation, vertx] 2023-01-07 at io.quarkus.qute.SectionNode.resolve(SectionNode.java:58) ... 32 more ``` ### Expected behavior Dev UI for GRPC services to work correctly ### Actual behavior Fails with Internal Server Error and Dev console request failed ### How to Reproduce? Steps to reproduce the behaviour: 1. create a new project `quarkus create app com.acme:helloworld` 2. Follow the grpc guide at `https://quarkus.io/guides/grpc-getting-started#implementing-a-grpc-service` adding the dependencies ``` io.quarkus quarkus-grpc ``` 3. Create the src/main/proto/helloworld.proto as per the guide 4. mvn compile as per the guide to generate the grpc code 5. Create the src/main/java/org/acme/HelloService.java as per the guide 6. run `quarkus dev` 7. navigate to Dev ui 8. go to the grpc services page `http://localhost:8080/q/dev/io.quarkus.quarkus-grpc/services` ### Output of `uname -a` or `ver` Darwin macbook 19.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 19.6.0: Tue Jun 21 21:18:39 PDT 2022; root:xnu-6153.141.66~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64 ### Output of `java -version` openjdk version "17.0.3" 2022-04-19 OpenJDK Runtime Environment GraalVM CE 22.1.0 (build 17.0.3+7-jvmci-22.1-b06) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM GraalVM CE 22.1.0 (build 17.0.3+7-jvmci-22.1-b06, mixed mode, sharing) ### GraalVM version (if different from Java) _No response_ ### Quarkus version or git rev Quarkus 2.15.2.Final ### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`) Apache Maven 3.8.4 (9b656c72d54e5bacbed989b64718c159fe39b537) Maven home: /Users/priyanknarvekar/.m2/wrapper/dists/apache-maven-3.8.4-bin/52ccbt68d252mdldqsfsn03jlf/apache-maven-3.8.4 Java version: 17.0.3, vendor: GraalVM Community, runtime: /Users/priyanknarvekar/.sdkman/candidates/java/22.1.0.r17-grl Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "10.15.7", arch: "x86_64", family: "mac ### Additional information _No response_
